name: Grave Danger: Ultimate Edition
description: Grave Danger is an action packed adventure game about an unlikely group of heroes. Switch between Dante the cowboy, Elliot the wizard, and Malice the reaper; use their different abilities to solve puzzles and make their way out of trouble. Will you be able to guide them to victory?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
